definition: to finish work/to get off work
down/downwards/below/lower/later/next (week etc)/second (of two parts)/to decline/to go down/to arrive at (a decision, conclusion etc)/measure word to show the frequency of an action

sentences.english: Of course, microwavable meals are nice when you worked late or are just way too busy.
sentences.chinese: 當然，要是下班太晚或太忙，微波爐蒸肉也不錯。

sentences.english: If you work in a factory, you usually have to punch a clock.
sentences.chinese: 如果你在工廠工作，你就要在上下班記時卡上打孔。

sentences.english: At 4:00, Mrs. Chen comes home from work with her son.
sentences.chinese: 四點陳太太下班後同兒子一起回家。

sentences.english: He is off at 6 pm, but usually leave his office around midnight.
sentences.chinese: 他六點下班，但通常都是快半夜才走。

sentences.english: We not only have the training, but the obligation, on or off duty.
sentences.chinese: 我們不僅有訓練，也有義務，即使下班時間。

sentences.english: She tried to brownnose the boss by staying after work and helping him clean the room.
sentences.chinese: 她企圖在下班後呆下來幫老闆清掃房間以討好他。

sentences.english: The network is already creating a new class of intercity commuters.
sentences.chinese: 鐵路網絡已經造就一批在城際間上下班的新羣體。

sentences.english: Yu had expected that he could get off work on time before he took the job.
sentences.chinese: 在入職之前，餘良德還期望自己能夠準點下班。

sentences.english: It was Friday, and it was time to work out.
sentences.chinese: 那時正是星期五，快下班了。

sentences.english: and we went to pick her up from work, and so we went out in the streets, you know.
sentences.chinese: 我們去接她下班，在街道上行駛。

sentences.english: But if that's too much of a commute, try Eastbourne.
sentences.chinese: 如果你嫌那裏上下班人流過大，可以試試去伊斯特本。

sentences.english: After work, I always like "Night in Paris" sit awhile.
sentences.chinese: 下班之後，我總喜歡在“夜巴黎”小坐片刻。

sentences.english: Walking in the daily on the way to pass, See the fallen leaves all over the ground.
sentences.chinese: 走在那條每天上下班要經過的路，只見落葉滿地都是。

sentences.english: He augments his wages by working in his free time.
sentences.chinese: 他在下班後工作以增加收入。

sentences.english: As usual, Abraham hugged his wife when he returned home from work.
sentences.chinese: 阿伯拉漢下班回到家，照常先擁抱妻子。

definition: to go to work/to be on duty/to start work/to go to the office
time of going to work/the morning rush hour
to dismiss students at the end of the school day
to go out/to leave home/to go on a journey/away from home/(of a woman) to get married
to stop work for the day (generally of laborers)/to knock off
